ComicInfo.Summary:
Why is Petra trying to create a schism between Lucien and Andromeda? The answer to that question will surely shock you, as the uneasy alliance Petra forged comes crashing down, and a new threat emerges who will mean nothing but TROUBLE!
In Minea, Marcus is coming to realize that the rule of Rowina has in fact enslaved him and the people he meant to rule while Petra has made a connection between the haunted dreams of Lucien and her late father Sophocles. Back on Earth, Andromeda and Salvati are just visited by a Dayak warrior on a motorcycle.
